tool_description: A Quotes API is an application programming interface that allows developers to access and retrieve a collection of quotes. It provides a convenient way to access a wide range of quotes from various authors, categories, or topics.Using a Quotes API, developers can integrate inspiring, motivational, or thought-provoking quotes into their applications, websites, or projects. The API typically offers endpoints that allow developers to fetch random quotes, search for quotes based on keywords or ca...
name: Quotes_v2
title: Quotes

api_list.name: Quotes by Keywords
Get Available Authors
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quotes85.p.rapidapi.com/author/getAuthors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quotes85.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
